title: President tells Asian political leadership at 5th FAO confab: Protect region’s aquaculture; Voices concern on threat posed to small scale fishermen:
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa said that the commitment of the Asian political leadership is essential to collectively overcome the challenges faced by the fisheries and aquaculture industry at present. President Rajapaksa was delivering the keynote address at the Asian Regional Ministerial Meeting on Aquaculture for Food Security, Nutrition and Economic Development yesterday at the Hilton Hotel,…
